/config.description: Choose a Share for FileRun configuration. Eg: create a Share called filerun-config for this purpose alone.
/config.label: Config Storage

PUID.description: Enter a valid UID to run Plex with. It must have full permissions to all Shares mapped in the previous step.
PUID.label: UID

PGID.description: Enter a valid GID to use along with the above UID. It(or the above UID) must have full permissions to all Shares mapped in the previous step.
PGID.label: GID

FileRun.description: A full featured web based file manager with an easy to use user interface
FileRun.more_info: Default username for your FileRun UI issuperuserand password issuperuser
